data.title: Great drinks
data.text: This is a great place to get nice cocktails, and they have a small but nice wine list.  It's dark inside, evoking a speak-easy vibe.  We came in the late afternoon and it was super laid back.

data.title: unique setting
data.text: If you are planning on visiting this bar make note of the address as there is no sign outside .Friendly staff took us to one of the back rooms showing old movies on the wall. We didn't have any food but other tables did and raved about it.They do need to clean up the entrance which was littered with trash but overall a good experience.

data.title: Phenomenal food in a Speakeasy atmosphere
data.text: We had the opportunity to sample several of their signature cocktails and they were all excellent.  They have a great selection of high-end spirits and the bartenders Kate and Jesse were knowledgeable and really fun.     We tried several appetizers and a sandwich and would recommend them all but our favorite thing was the Tots.   Ore-Ida invented them but John Brown has perfected them!   Though the menu is limited, the eclectic pub fare offers something for everyone and the kitchen is open as late as the bar.
